entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT, Kugluktuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:28 AM MDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugluktuk Airport 06:00 AM MDT Thursday 05 May 2016
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: NNW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Blowing snow with visibilities frequently less than 1 kilometre late this morning and this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Forecast issued 03:17 AM MDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Blowing snow with visibilities frequently less than 1 kilometre. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 03:17 AM MDT Thursday 05 May 2016
